definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ec 7:2 end, late synon. of [[קֵץ]];—´[[ס]] abs. Ec 3:11, cstr. 2Ch 20:16 + 2 t.; sf. [[סׂפוֹ]] Joe 2:20; —end of wady 2Ch 20:16, of invading swarm Joe 2:20; of God's work [[מֵראׁשׁ וְעַד־סוֹף]] Ec 3:11; death as end of all men Ec 7:2; = conclusion, sum of instruction Ec 12:13. Cf. Baram.
